trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around June 12th 1997
Summary: bright light moving eraticly across the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my apt off Tropicana and Boulder Hwy..I was talking to a friend on the phone watching a black widow male try to mate..I looked up in the sky and a light moved very fast, making 90 degree turns with incredible speed and precision. I even narrated it to my friend while I talked to her. It made about 6 90 degrees turns and then took off into the direction of the big dipper, and dissappeared.
